      • checkCoordinates

        boolean checkCoordinates(ViewParty party,
                         java.awt.geom.Point2D clickPosition,
                         java.awt.geom.Point2D windowPosition)
        Check if there is a party position at the clicked position
        Parameters:
        party - ViewParty that is going to be checked
        clickPosition - The clicked position
        windowPosition - Position of the diagramwindow
        Returns:
        True if the party is positioned at the clicked position False if the party is not positioned at the clicked position
